DESCRIPTION: Set the mod logs channel on your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}setmodlogs enable** ~ Enables the modlogs channel in the channel you just used this command in.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}setmodlogs disable** ~ Disables the modlogs features in your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}setmodlogs [#Channel]** ~ Sets a channel to be used for the modlogs in your server.
ALIASES: modlogs does not have any aliases
ALREADY_ENABLED: The modlogs is already enabled on this server.
ENABLED: The modlogs has been enabled on this channel.
ALREADY_DISABLED: The modlogs is already disabled on this server.
NEED_CHANNEL: You did not provide a channel to use for the modlogs.
CHANNEL_SET: The {{channel}} has been set for modlogs on this server.
